snippet: The high school in Broken Bow held a vigil on Saturday morning for a basketball coach and an assistant coach who were killed when a team van returning from a camp collided with a pickup truck.
abstract: High school in Broken Bow, Nebraska, holds a vigil for Zane Harvey and Anthony Blum, two basketball coaches who were killed when a team van returning from a camp collided with a pickup truck.
lead_paragraph: The high school in Broken Bow held a vigil on Saturday morning for a basketball coach and an assistant coach who were killed when a team van returning from a camp collided with a pickup truck.

headline.main: Nebraska: Vigil for High School Basketball Coaches
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Vigil For High School Basketball Coaches
